metadata.synopsis: One-liner for the elf of the ghost watcher group.
metadata.how_to_trigger: talk to the elf of the group at -236, 35, -37

0.speaker: Gor Falogen
0.text: I just hope following this sorry band isn't taking you away from more valuable work.
0.context: NodeContext: Grudging respect; confused as to why the player is lowering themself by being here

1.speaker: Gor Falogen
1.text: Unless you want to become a ghost yourself, I suggest you leave.
1.context: NodeContext: Bored-sounding threat (just wants the player to leave)

2.speaker: Gor Falogen
2.text: Perhaps I'd get a better conversation from a ghost than this lot.
2.context: NodeContext: Bored contemplation; doesn't believe in ghosts

3.speaker: Gor Falogen
3.text: If you're looking for ghosts, you can be sure there's absolutely none of those here.
3.context: NodeContext: Bored; doesn't believe in ghosts

4.speaker: Gor Falogen
4.text: What's that? Hm, I don't hear anything. Must have been a ghost.
4.context: NodeContext: Pretending not to hear the player; sarcastic (doesn't believe in ghosts)

5.speaker: Gor Falogen
5.text: I'm surprised someone of your stature is here ghost hunting - don't you have more heroic things to do?
